generate_greeting.step_intent: Produce a concise, personalized salutation addressing the provided name for use in communications.

get_auth_provider_url.step_intent: Obtain the provider-specific authorization URL needed to redirect users and start the OAuth/OIDC login process.

compose_email_message.step_intent: Generate a send-ready, encoded raw email message from provided fields for downstream email delivery APIs.
Compose and base64url-encode a plain-text RFC 2822 email from the recipient, body, and optional sender/subject to create a raw message payload.

send_email_by_gmail.step_intent: Send the composed raw message from the authenticated Gmail account (using 'me' or a UI-selected account), creating a sent message in Gmail.
Send an email through Gmail using the provided raw MIME payload.

send_email_by_gmail_w_upload.step_intent: Transmit the email via Gmail using a provided raw MIME payload as the authenticated user.

delete_email_message_by_id.step_intent: Permanently remove the just-sent message from the sender’s mailbox using the returned message ID.
Permanently remove the sent message from the mailbox using the message ID returned by the send operation.
Permanently delete the selected message using its ID obtained from the listing step.

list_gmail_messages.step_intent: Identify candidate messages by listing message IDs that match a supplied search query and/or filters.

Enumerate calendars the user can access to obtain valid calendar IDs and allow the user to select the target calendar.

Identify and present calendars the user can access for target selection.

Retrieve and review existing events in the selected calendar using optional filters to assess scheduling constraints.

get_google_calendar_by_id.step_intent: Retrieve detailed metadata for the selected calendar using the calendarId obtained from the previous step.

Create a new event using the retrieved details (and any user-specified adjustments) on the selected target calendar.

Retrieve detailed metadata (requested parts) for the discovered video IDs to support analysis and decision-making.

Fetch the source event’s complete details to serve as the template for duplication.

get_google_drive_metadata.step_intent: Retrieve only the specified About fields to understand quotas, formats, limits, and capabilities before performing Drive operations.

get_google_drive_by_id.step_intent: Retrieve the selected shared drive’s canonical metadata using its ID for detailed review.

delete_shared_google_drive.step_intent: Permanently delete the user-selected shared drive, optionally deleting all items inside when using domain admin access.

retrieve_google_drive_file_by_id.step_intent: Fetch the selected file’s metadata or content using its fileId produced by the listing step.

upload_google_drive_file.step_intent: Create the file in Google Drive using media or multipart mode and obtain the resulting file metadata, including fileId.
Create the file in Google Drive using media or multipart mode and capture the returned fileId from the resulting metadata.

create_google_drive_file_metadata.step_intent: Create a new Google Drive item with the specified metadata to obtain its unique identifier.
Create a temporary Drive item to validate creation rights or stage a placeholder without uploading content.
